sourcesContent: import{styled as e}from"../theme/stitches.config";import{cssFocusVisible as t}from"../theme/shared-css";export const StyledUser=e("div",{d:"inline-flex",p:"0 $sm",jc:"center",ai:"center",w:"max-content",maxWidth:"100%",transition:"transform 250ms ease 0ms, box-shadow 0.25s ease 0s","@motion":{transition:"none"}},t);export const StyledUserInfo=e("div",{ml:"$sm",d:"inline-flex",fd:"column",alignItems:"flex-start",whiteSpace:"nowrap"});export const StyledUserName=e("span",{fontSize:"$sm",color:"$text",lh:"$sm",fontWeight:"$medium",maxW:"$60",to:"ellipsis",ov:"hidden"});export const StyledUserDesc=e("span",{fontSize:"$xs",color:"$accents7","*:first-child":{mt:0},"*:last-child":{mb:0}});
